title: Usure Nee Lyrics Mahabalipuram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Mahabalipuram Usure Nee Song Lyrics
Singers: Imman, Shakthisree
Music: K
Lyrics:Yugabharathi,

Usure nee kalangadhey
oru podhum varundhadhey
iravodum pagalodum
thuniyaaven thugalaadhe.

Usure nee thonai aanaa
endha sogam thoraththaadhe
kanavodum nenavodum
kadha pesu vilagadhey

Unadhu thozhil saaindhu
uranga pidikkudhey.
unadhu mugathai paarthu
vizhikka pidikkudhey

Usure nee kalangadhey
oru podhum varundhadhey
iravodum pagalodum
thuniyaaven thugalaaiven

Unake pirandhen
ena naan unardhaen.
edhayum, athanaal
tharavum thuniyuren.

Nodiyum koduthaal
minidam tharugiren.
unai nee koduthaal
tharave maattaen
en kannae.

Usure nee kalangadhey
oru podhum varundhadhey
kanavodum nenavodum
kadha pesu vilagadhey

Irulil vilakka
inaitha velicham nee
uyire unakke
tharuven naaney
en anbae.

Usure nee kalangadhey
oru podhum varundhadhey
iravodum pagalodum
thuniyaaven thugalaadhe.

Usure nee thonai aanaa
endha sogam thoraththaadhe
kanavodum nenavodum
kadha pesu vilagadhey

Unadhu thozhil saaindhu
uranga pidikkudhey.
unadhu mugathai paarthu
vizhikka pidikkudhey
